Name: Bandits
About the game: A standalone local-only Tank Battle Arena! Play the 16 Solo Missions , or the 2-4 players Battle Arena with 12 different arenas to battle in ! There's a tons of destructible elements in all of the game 4 environments! Play with any of 8 different characters with their own play-style and abilities, and their cool unique looking tank-like-machine!
